titleInfo.title: Assembly and application of an instrument for attosecond time-resolved ionization chronoscopy

mods.abstract: In the framework of this thesis a new setup for attosecond time-resolved measurements has been built and observations of ionization dynamics in rare gas atoms have been made. This new technique is entitled Ionization Chronoscopy and gives further evidence that time-resolved experiments in the attosecond regime will become a powerful tool for investigations in atomic physics.

subject.topic: Attosekundenspektroskopie , Femtosekundenspektroskopie , Extremes Ultraviolett , Attosekunde , Ultrakurz , Pump-Probe , Spektroskopie , Laserspektroskopie , Attosecond , Ultrafast , Spectroscopy , Laser spectroscopy
